stochastic_function: lambda weather_outcome: {'rain': 0.9, 'no rain': 0.1} if weather_outcome == 'rain' else {'rain': 0.1, 'no rain': 0.9}
lambda carry_umbrella_decision, weather_outcome: {-2.0: 1.0} if carry_umbrella_decision == 'carry' else {-5.0: 1.0} if weather_outcome == 'rain' else {0.0: 1.0}
